contentList.content: Nekomimi

Nekomimi, or “cat-eared,” are strikingly similar to your average meowing companion. With fluffy tails and ears to match, Nekomimi are the cuddliest of all the faces you see in Faerûn - but don't underestimate them! Their claws can pack a real punch.
Nekomimi

Nekomimi, or “cat-eared,” are strikingly similar to your average meowing companion. With fluffy tails and ears to match, Nekomimi are the cuddliest of all the faces you see in Faerûn - but don't underestimate them! Their claws can pack a real punch.
Calico Nekomimi

Sassy and spunky, Calico Nekomimi are as diverse and breathtaking as their coat patterns. They are especially charismatic and have a mystic aura about them, granting them an affinity with magic. The majority of Calico Nekomimi are female, so count yourself lucky if you come across a male kitty!
Calico Nekomimi

Sassy and spunky, Calico Nekomimi are as diverse and breathtaking as their coat patterns. They are especially charismatic and have a mystic aura about them, granting them an affinity with magic. The majority of Calico Nekomimi are female, so count yourself lucky if you come across a male kitty!
Orange Nekomimi

What they lack in intelligence, they make up for in love and strength! Orange Nekomimi may be the silliest of all Nekomimi, but beware their cattitude. Orange Nekomimi are a force to be reckoned with!
Orange Nekomimi

What they lack in intelligence, they make up for in love and strength! Orange Nekomimi may be the silliest of all Nekomimi, but beware their cattitude. Orange Nekomimi are a force to be reckoned with!
Void Nekomimi

Did that shadow just move? Nope! It's a fluffy Void Nekomimi. Dark as night, these lovely voids blend into the shadows and are amazingly dexterous. You'll need to roll quite high on your perception check in order to clock these kitties!
Void Nekomimi

Did that shadow just move? Nope! It's a fluffy Void Nekomimi. Dark as night, these lovely voids blend into the shadows and are amazingly dexterous. You'll need to roll quite high on your perception check in order to clock these kitties!
Kitty's Claws
Aww you like my nails uwu? Would you like a closer look?
Nom! :3
uwu give those bad guys a chomp!!!
